entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
